title: Tether and the United Nations Join Forces to Strengthen Community Resilience against Crime and Protect Victims
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital asset ecosystem, announced today a joint initiative with the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC), a […]
date: The largest stablecoin provider collaborates with the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime to strengthen cybersecurity and public education on digital asset security in Africa. 9 January 2026 –

title: Tether and Rumble Launch Rumble Wallet, Bringing Self-Custodial Crypto Payments to Millions of Creators and Users
content: Tether, the largest company in the digital assets industry, and Rumble (NASDAQ:RUM), the Freedom-First technology platform, today announced the launch of Rumble Wallet, a self-custodial crypto wallet integrated directly into the Rumble ecosystem. The launch builds on Rumble’s earlier tipping functionality, resulting in a production-ready, platform-native financial infrastructure that embeds self-custodial […]
